title: Trump might travel to Turkey for Russia-Ukraine peace talks
shortDescription: Trump said he might travel to Turkey for peace talks between Russia and Ukraine, for what he said could be an agreement for a 30-day cease-fire.

title: Trump plans to accept jet from Qatar
shortDescription: President Donald Trump plans to accept 747-8 jumbo jet from Qatar's royal family to replace Air Force One.

title: What to know as Trump, China agree to slash tariffs for 90 days
shortDescription: The Trump administration and China have agreed to slash tariffs for the next 90 days in a push to deescalate a trade war between the two countries.

title: Trump signs executive order to reducing drug prices. What to know
shortDescription: The executive order directs Trump's administration to take actions against "discriminatory" policies in foreign countries that suppress drug prices.

title: Trump plans to accept 747 from Qatar for Air Force One, source says
shortDescription: U.S. President Donald Trump may get a new Air Force One in the form of a Boeing 747 as a gift from the Qatari royal family.

title: Trump to sign order to cut prices of medicines
shortDescription: Donald Trump said he would sign an order to cut prescription prices to the levels paid by other nations.

title: Trump says he will sign order aimed at cutting drug prices
shortDescription: President Trump will sign an executive order that institutes a "most favored nation" policy for prescription drug pricing in a push to lower prices.

title: Zelenskyy agrees to meet Putin in Istanbul after Trump weighs in
shortDescription: "I will be waiting for Putin in Türkiye on Thursday," Zelenskyy wrote on X.

title: Trump officials say trade deal reached with China
shortDescription: The White House announced a "China trade deal" in a statement, but did not disclose details.

title: Trump in talks to accept luxury jet from Qatar royal family
shortDescription: Trump would like the Defense Department to use the plane while he is in office and then have it donated to his presidential library and foundation.

title: Dems face criminal probe over ICE detention center scuffle
shortDescription: Newark Mayor Ras Baraka said he was arrested outside the ICE facility after joining members of Congress on an hour-long tour inside the gates.

title: Trump uses birthright citizenship case in bid to curb judges' power
shortDescription: President Trump is counting on the Supreme Court to limit the ability of judges to put his policies on hold while they're being challenged.

title: Trump touts 'great progress' as trade talks begin with China
shortDescription: President Trump said "great progress" was made in trade talks with China, describing the meetings as "a total reset" and touting some agreements.

title: Trump welcomes white South Africans, though other refugees are halted
shortDescription: After suspending the U.S. refugee program, President Trump is making an exception for white South Africans, known as Africaners

title: Trump administration floats suspending habeas corpus: What's that?
shortDescription: A writ of habeas corpus is used in federal courts under civil law to challenge a person’s detention.
